content.raw:
Isn't this assuming that drcsim and gazebo will both be installed into the same install prefix? While this MAY be the case it is not NECESSARILY the case. 

Edit: After looking again I see that the script tries to look in the drcsim's install prefix, as well in /usr install prefix. This is still making some assumptions which could be broken. I think the more correct way would be for Gazebo to generate a ProjectConfig.cmake[1] file, and have drcsim look for and use that to generate its own setup.sh file. 

[1] http://www.cmake.org/Wiki/CMake/Tutorials/How_to_create_a_ProjectConfig.cmake_file
